Text:
1st RULE: You do not talk about Fight Club.

2nd RULE: You DO NOT talk about Fight Club.

3rd RULE: If someone says "stop" or goes limp, taps out the fight is over.

4th RULE: Only two guys to a fight.

5th RULE: One fight at a time.

6th RULE: No shirts, no shoes.

7th RULE: Fights will go on as long as they have to.

8th RULE: If this is your first night at Fight Club, you HAVE to fight.


I was amazed by the movie, didn't know there was a game:P

I found the rules over here:
http://www.diggingforfire.net/FightClub/

thx DiggingForFire! :P
Love the movie! Game reviews on the other hand look bad, but I just HAVE to check this out.
